title: Create a React Application for Nx
description: Create a React Application for Nx.

examples.description: Use class components instead of functional components

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the application?

displayName.description: The display name to show in the application. Defaults to name.

directory.description: The directory of the new application.

projectNameAndRootFormat.description: Whether to generate the project name and root directory as provided (`as-provided`) or generate them composing their values and taking the configured layout into account (`derived`).

linter.description: The tool to use for running lint checks.

unitTestRunner.description: Test runner to use for unit tests

tags.description: Add tags to the application (used for linting).

js.description: Generate JavaScript files rather than TypeScript files

setParserOptionsProject.description: Whether or not to configure the ESLint `parserOptions.project` option. We do not do this by default for lint performance reasons.

e2eTestRunner.description: Adds the specified e2e test runner.

install.description: Runs `pod install` for native modules before building iOS app.

bundler.x-prompt: Which bundler do you want to use to build the application?
